amendment.description: Amendment makes minor technical edits and includes an addition to the oversight section requiring the Secretary of Education to disseminate best practices with respect to demonstration projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to make minor technical edits and include an addition to the oversight section requiring the Secretary of Education to disseminate best practices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kline amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
